alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 7:21PM CDT until May 10 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 720 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Higgins, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Gage and Catesby. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
